name: Cats Your Vote by USC Games
name_original: Cats Your Vote by USC Games
description:
By USC Games.

Cats Your Vote analogizes the relationship between an individual’s ambitions and a community’s shared well-being in a way that today’s young game-player can relate to.
It does not aim to make a moral argument for virtual civic duty, but instead provides participants the same kind of emotional experiences of ownership, connection, insight, and influence that motivate people to vote in elections.

https://catsyourvote.com/
